DOC.brief_summary: To test blood specimen use new investigational test detects antigen antibody human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) . Results compare approve HIV antibody test supplemental testing perform determine HIV status .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Diagnostic HIV Ag/Ab Combo Assay
DOC.detailed_description: All specimen collect separate specimen collection protocol obtain specimen supplier provide clinical site perform investigational HIV test . This include 6252 specimen collect normal healthy individual ( 7B5-02-05Z01-01 : Collection Specimens Used Abbott Laboratories In Vitro Diagnostic HIV Hepatitis Assays Clinical Studies ) specimen supplier . 588 specimens HIV-infected pediatric subject 448 pregnant female risk HIV infection collect protocol ( 7B5-02-05Z01-02 : Collection Pediatric Pregnant Female Specimens Used Abbott Laboratories In Vitro Diagnostic HIV Assay ) specimen supplier . All specimens previously collect frozen , except subset 586 specimen normal healthy population 55 specimen pregnant female risk HIV infection collect separate specimen collection protocol test fresh specimen study . In addition , 83 specimen HIV antigen positive , 1121 specimens HIV-1 antibody positive , 201 specimen HIV-2 antibody positive , 1409 specimens US risk HIV infection HIV-2 endemic area obtain specimen supplier , except 11 pediatric specimen collect separate protocol ( 7B5-02-05Z01-02 : Collection Pediatric Pregnant Female Specimens Used Abbott Laboratories In Vitro Diagnostic HIV Assay ) .
DOC.criteria: Normal Healthy Population : Apparently healthy individual time enrollment affirm subject HIV infection affirm subject Pregnant Female Population Risk HIV Infection : Subject pregnant female Subject risk factor HIV infection HIV infection affirm subject HIV1 Positive Pregnant Female Subjects Subject pregnant female first , second , third trimester Subject must document HIV infection HIV1 Positive Pediatric Subjects Subject must 2 year 16 year age Subject must document HIV infection ( e.g. , Western blot positive HIV RNA positive/detectable )
